description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. Guardian security established contact with the Mayor of Bosaso, who signed a letter of intent demonstrating his support of the project. They furthermore established contact with the Minister of Ports, the Minister for Fisheries, the Minister of Planning (who is in charge of and has an overview of all development projects in the region) and the Minister of Security, who all expressed interested and support of the project. In order to move forward, Guardian identified the need to obtain buy-in from Danish or European actors with a commercial and/or development mandate.

The aim of the project is, through a partnership with local actors, to help create and maintain secure accommodation and office spaces in Bosaso, the commercial center of Puntland, Somalia, which is undergoing positive economic and political development, but still holds a high level of instability and security risks.
